channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Bridge CC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Bridge CC

item.title: CVE-2019-7133|2024-08-04T20:38:33.390Z -- adobe -- adobe%20bridge%20cc
item.description: Adobe Bridge CC versions 9.0.2 have an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2019-8239|2024-08-04T21:17:29.929Z -- adobe -- adobe%20bridge%20cc
item.description: Adobe Bridge CC versions 9.1 and earlier have a memory corruption vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure.
